concept.title: 629.303 Application of State and local taxes to Government contractors and subcontractors.

conbody.p: The authority to make the determination prescribed in FAR 29.303(a) is delegated, without power of redelegation, to the head of the contracting activity (see 601.603-70). The Office of the Legal Adviser is the agency-designated counsel for the purposes of FAR 29.303(c).
